item.title: Rick Warren’s Bell-Curve View Of Jesus Is Bad Politics And Worse Theology
item.description: If our positions are properly calibrated to the truth, moderating them is not an act of virtue but one of cowardice.

item.title: ESPN’s Egregious, Decade-Long Track Record Of Politicization Is Ruining Sports TV
item.description: ESPN’s political activism paired with its encouragement of players’ activism has turned off audiences.

item.title: Watchdog: 22 Blue States Joined Secret Anti-Trump Resistance Pact
item.description: Top Democrat officials of 22 states, with D.C. and San Francisco, signed a pact to resist limitations on birthright citizenship.

item.title: Ilhan Omar Is A Walking Case For Higher U.S. Citizenship Standards
item.description: Rep. Brandon Gill opined, 'America would be a better place if @IlhanMN were deported back to Somalia.' The left is going apoplectic.

item.title: DOGE Is Uncovering The Government Corruption America’s Media Spent Years Ignoring
item.description: DOGE has done more to unearth government corruption in one month than corporate media 'journalists' have done in years.
